titles.title: Twenty Sixth Sunday in ordinary time

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My soul,
give praise to the Lord!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is the Lord
who preserves fidelity forever,
who does justice
to those who are oppressed.
It is he who gives bread
to the hungry,
the Lord who sets prisoners free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It is the Lord who opens
the eyes of the blind,
the Lord who raises up those
who are bowed down,
It is the Lord who loves the just,
the Lord who protects the stranger.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Lord upholds the orphan
and the widow,
but thwarts the path of the wicked.
The Lord will reign forever,
the God of Sion from age to age.
